Package com.jogamp.opencl.gl

Interface Summary
CLGLI Java bindings to OpenCL, the Open Computing Language.
 

Class Summary
CLGLBuffer<B extends Buffer> Shared buffer between OpenGL and OpenCL contexts.
CLGLContext OpenCL Context supporting JOGL-JOCL interoperablity.
CLGLImage2d<B extends Buffer> 2D OpenCL image representing an OpenGL renderbuffer.
CLGLTexture2d<B extends Buffer> 2D OpenCL image representing an 2D OpenGL texture.
CLGLTexture3d<B extends Buffer> 3D OpenCL image representing an 3D OpenGL texture.
